iou_license.description: Manages or displays IOU license information.

me.description: Retrieves details about the currently authenticated user.

update_user.description: Updates information for an existing user account.

update_group.description: Updates details of an existing user group.

update_acl.description: Updates entries in the access control list.

update_template.description: Updates an existing template used for creating resources.

update_project.description: Updates configuration or metadata for a project.

update_compute.description: Updates settings of a compute resource.

update_role.description: Updates the permissions or name of a specific role.

add_group_member.description: Adds a user to a specific group.

add_ressouce_to_pool.description: Assigns a resource to a specific pool.

update_role_privs.description: Modifies the privileges associated with a specific role.

update_node.description: Updates the configuration or status of a node.

update_drawing.description: Modifies an existing drawing or visual resource layout.

update_link.description: Updates properties or endpoints of a link between nodes.

update_disk_image.description: Updates an existing disk image with new data or settings.
